result.eng: Strangely enough, she got her education in England and not in Ireland.

result.ponchtml: Ḃí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíoċta a ċur os coṁair an ṗobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.html: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: They drank some of the whiskey.
result.ga: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.orig: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beatha
result.html: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beathaThey drank some of the whiskey.
result.ponchtml: D'ól siad cuid den uisce beaṫaThey drank some of the whiskey.

result.eng: As part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ga: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.orig: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.html: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ponchtml: Mar ċuid den uisce faoi ṫalaṁ lofa seo cuireaḋ an prionsa i dteaċ na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.

result.eng: My brothers were as thin as sticks.
result.ga: Bhí mo chuid deartháireacha chomh seang leis an maide
result.orig: Bhí mo chuid deartháireacha chomh seang leis an maide
result.html: Bhí mo chuid deartháireacha chomh seang leis an maideMy brothers were as thin as sticks.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċuid dearṫáireaċa ċoṁ seang leis an maideMy brothers were as thin as sticks.

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.html: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí madraí leis Ní cuiṁin liom aċ a gcuid fiacla ag drannaḋ orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.

result.eng: She would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.
result.ga: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léithe
result.orig: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léithe
result.html: Thabharfadh sí an leabhar go raibh a chuid gruaige tar éis dul i léitheShe would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.
result.ponchtml: Ṫaḃarfaḋ sí an leaḃar go raiḃ a ċuid gruaige tar éis dul i léiṫeShe would bet that his hair has gotten greyer.

result.eng: Her hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ga: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.orig: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteach
result.html: Bhí a cuid gruaige greamaithe dá baithis ag an mbáisteachHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a cuid gruaige greamaiṫe dá baiṫis ag an mbáisteaċHer hair was stuck to her forehead from the rain.

result.eng: The secret service is operating in many countries.
result.ga: Tá an tseirbhís rúnda ag gníomhú in an-chuid tíortha
result.orig: Tá an tseirbhís rúnda ag gníomhú in an-chuid tíortha
result.html: Tá an tseirbhís rúnda ag gníomhú in an-chuid tíorthaThe secret service is operating in many countries.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tseirḃís rúnda ag gníoṁú in an-ċuid tíorṫaThe secret service is operating in many countries.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.html: Buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradhShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ga: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.orig: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaigh
result.html: Níor ligeadh di a cuid a ithe i gcuideachta an teaghlaighShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.
result.ponchtml: Níor ligeaḋ di a cuid a iṫe i gcuideaċta an teaġlaiġShe wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.

result.eng: The images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ga: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.orig: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaine
result.html: Bhain na híomhánna bíogadh asam lena gcuid áilleachta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain na híoṁánna bíogaḋ asam lena gcuid áilleaċta aduaineThe images startled me with their strange beauty.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: Of course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.orig: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráin
result.html: Ar ndóigh bhí cuid acu chomh leamh le bheith ag amharc ar mhúscán gorm ag fás ar phíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.
result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ḃí cuid acu ċoṁ leaṁ le ḃeiṫ ag aṁarc ar ṁúscán gorm ag fás ar ṗíosa aráinOf course, some of them were as boring as watching blue mould growing on a piece of bread.

result.eng: But many of them look tired now.
result.ga: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo
result.orig: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seo
result.html: Ach tá cuma spíonta ar chuid mhór acu fán tráth seoBut many of them look tired now.
result.ponchtml: Aċ tá cuma spíonta ar ċuid ṁór acu fán tráṫ seoBut many of them look tired now.

result.eng: Some writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ga: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.orig: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.html: Is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ponchtml: Is beag aisċoṫú a fuair scríḃneoirí áiriṫe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.

result.eng: The brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.
result.ga: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointe
result.orig: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointe
result.html: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointeThe brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.
result.ponchtml: Éilíonn gontaċt na formáide 140 caraċtar naċ dtéann an scríḃneoir ċun fadála ina ċuid smaointeThe brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.

result.eng: Most of the country's businesses are in private ownership.
result.ga: Tá an chuid is mó de ghnólachtaí na tíre i seilbh phríobháideach
result.orig: Tá an chuid is mó de ghnólachtaí na tíre i seilbh phríobháideach
result.html: Tá an chuid is mó de ghnólachtaí na tíre i seilbh phríobháideachMost of the country's businesses are in private ownership.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċuid is mó de ġnólaċtaí na tíre i seilḃ ṗríoḃáideaċMost of the country's businesses are in private ownership.

result.eng: Now now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ga: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.orig: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéalta
result.html: Seo seo tá a bhfuil sa teach amú ag do chuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.
result.ponchtml: Seo seo tá a ḃfuil sa teaċ amú ag do ċuid scéaltaNow now, you have everybody in the house confused with your stories.

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé air a ċuid smugaċán díṁúinte a ċoinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.

result.eng: Shut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ga: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.orig: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.html: Druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ponchtml: Druid do ḃéal ó do ċuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
